author: @paulabatistadesouza
text: I have a business role in Operations / Planning, but all my major accomplishments were related to collecting, treating and analyzing data in Excel and Power BI. I fear that strict data roles may get me too far from the business routine, what could be a problem as I do enjoy living in the supply chain area. I am not sure if being a Data Scientist is my ultimate goal, but I also don't know which roles would be more aligned to my objectives.
